property.name: spatialHadoop.storage.LocalIndexBlockSize
property.description: Default block size for building local indexes

property.name: spatialHadoop.storage.RTreeBuildMode
property.description: Which mode to use when building the RTree. Could be "fast" or "light"

property.name: spatialHadoop.storage.IndexingOverhead
property.description: The recommended target overhead of indexing. The system starts with this value as an initial guess but resulting file could grow larger.

property.name: spatialHadoop.storage.SampleRatio
property.description: Ratio of input file (in terms of records) to be sampled to provide a big picture about data distribution when building a global index

property.name: spatialHadoop.storage.SampleSize
property.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of data to be sampled when building a distribution-aware global index

property.name: spatialHadoop.mapred.MaxShapesPerRead
property.description: Maximum number of shapes to read in one read operation and return when reading a file as an array

property.name: spatialHadoop.mapred.MaxBytesPerRead
property.description: Maximum size in bytes to be read in one shot when reading a file as an array

property.name: Plot.AdaptiveSample.Factor
property.description: Factor to be multiplied by adaptive sample ratio to increase quality
